about_the_game:
Your Objective

Frank is infected with a mysterious virus, slowly breaking him down.

It's made him weak and helpless. And you must protect him at all costs.

If you can keep him alive long enough, maybe—just maybe—you’ll find a way to cure him.

Navigate treacherous levels, overcome brutal enemy encounters, and use your one and only offensive tool - the Surge ability - to clear a path for Frank and keep him from falling apart.

Features

Master the Surge Ability – More than just a powered-up dash, Surge is your primary weapon, your problem-solving tool, and your way of interacting with the world. Use it to:

  • Surge Deflect – Redirect enemy projectiles back at them.

  • Surge Attack – Strike enemies by surging off of them.

  • Surge Blast – Surge off Frank to unleash a swarm of homing missiles.

  • Surge Explosion – When Frank takes damage, he drops a glowing orb. Surge off it to create a remote bomb—which can heal Frank if timed correctly!

Precision Platforming Meets Tactical Combat – Every level is a unique challenge. Expect:

  • Brutal platforming gauntlets that test your reflexes.

  • Relentless waves of enemies that require quick thinking and strategic use of Surge.

  • Puzzle sections where you and Frank work together to activate switches and unlock paths.

Boss Battles & Insane Challenges – Face off against deadly bosses, fight through absurdly difficult bonus levels, and prove your mastery of Surge.

This is one of the most unique platformers you’ll ever play. You’ve never protected an NPC like this before. You’ve never used a movement ability quite like Surge. And you’ve never played anything quite like this.

Good luck. Frank’s life is in your hands.

name: Surgebound

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8,8 10, or 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 / AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R7 260X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible
  • Additional Notes: A controller is recommended but not required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible, with support for stereo or surround sound
  • Additional Notes: A high refresh rate monitor and controller enhance the experience

short_description: A tough precision platformer where you must keep Frank, a fragile NPC, alive. Use the powerful Surge ability to unleash destruction on enemies, AND even heal Frank. Navigate BRUTALLY difficult levels, solve puzzles, and master tactical combat in one of the most unique platformers you'll ever play
